styledTables 0.4.2
  • Get started

Reference

All functions

Alignment()

Bug fix in xlsx package (indent != 0 is not supported)

AssertChar()

Check if a variable is a character, if not throw an error (using non standard evaluation)

AssertColorValue()

Check if a variable holds a color value (using non standard evaluation)

AssertLogical()

Check if a variable is a logical, if not throw an error (using non standard evaluation)

AssertNumber()

Check if a variable is a number, if not throw an error (using non standard evaluation)

AssertValue()

Check if a variable holds an allowed value (using non standard evaluation)

FILL_STYLES_

Import the non-exported FILL_STYLES_ from the xlsx package namespace

MissingOrNull-class

S4 helper class that summarizes NULL and missing values

initialize(<STCellStyle>)

Style class for single cells in styled tables

initialize(<StyledTable>)

Class StyledTable

nCols()

Number of cols in a StyledTable

nRows()

Number of rows in a StyledTable

setStyles()

Set styles of StyledTable cells

styledTable()

Create a styled table

addMerge()

Add merged region

appendLatexTable()

Append the LaTeX code for a StyledTable to an existing LaTeX table code

assertType()

Check if type is as expected (without using non standard evaluation)

assertValue_()

Check if a variable holds an allowed value (without non standard evaluation)

betweenVec()

Vectorized version of 'between'

checkValidity()

Check Validity of STCellStyle class object and return an error description, if there is an error

colorToHex()

Calculate the hex color value from a color name

compareStyles()

Compare Styles

concatFunctions()

Concatenate functions

createLatexTable()

Generate the LaTeX code for a StyledTable

createLatexTableBody()

Generate the LaTeX code for a StyledTable without begintabular and endtabular

createLogo()

Creates the logo of the styledTables package

createStyledCrossTableBody()

Create a styled cross table body

createStyledCrossTableHeader()

Method createStyledCrossTableHeader

createStyledSubTable()

Helper function that creates a styled sub table

doCallWithoutMissing()

Call function with arguments and remove all empty arguments (NULL or length == 0)

Method formatStatBody.

Call Ghostscript.

mergeEqualCells()

Merge all cells whose cell values are equal

Remove empty elements from a list

Escape latex commands

seq(<save>)

Improved seq command that returns an empty vector if lower > upper boundary

seq(<vec>)

Improved seq command which allows an two element vector holding the sequence boundaries
